lines.text:
[Cornered by a group of Klingons in his store]
Well, let me guess! You're either lost, or desperately searching for a good tailor.

[Shoots at Garak and inspects the injury]
You'll be fine, it's just a flesh wound.
That was awfully close. What if you killed me?
What makes you think I wasn't trying?
Doctor, I do believe there's hope for you yet.
You don't have anything to hide, do you?
[Looks at Leeta as she walks past]
You certainly don't.
You're still disgusting!
Wouldn't have it any other way!
Think of it! Five years ago no one had ever heard of Bajor or Deep Space Nine, and now, all our hopes rest here!

[Dukat's ship is pursuing the Dominion fleet]
Dukat! Stop trying to be a hero, get back to the station!
Your concern is touching, Major. But I'm afraid you misunderstand me. I'm not attacking the Dominion fleet, I'm joining it.
Four weeks! Are you telling me I've been hanging around a Changeling for over a month?
And you never suspected it wasn't me?
I have my eye on you, Quark.

[Jadzia Dax walks by]
And I have my eye on you, Jadzia.

[Bashir is trying to expose a Replicant disguised as O'Brien under the pretence of giving him a physical]
Any dizziness? Oversleeping? Lack of energy? Euphoria?

[sarcastically]
Yes! All of them! Especially euphoria! Lots of euphoria!

[Quark's]
The food here is abominable.

[to an alien, Ee'Char while imagining they're in an alien prison]
I'm sick of it! I'm sick of this place! I'm sick of your drawings, and most of all, I am sick of you!
